itunes:title: From the Archives: Dealing with Rejection
title: From the Archives: Dealing with Rejection
description: In today's episode from the archives, Bianca chats with award-winning and bestselling author, Lily King (author of Writers & Lovers) about the writer's life; scrapping novels halfway through; dealing with rejection; and starting the process all over again with a new book.
content:encoded: In today's episode from the archives, Bianca chats with award-winning and bestselling author, Lily King (author of Writers & Lovers) about the writer's life; scrapping novels halfway through; dealing with rejection; and starting the process all over again with a new book.
itunes:author: Bianca Marais, Carly Watters and CeCe Lyra
